consoleOne.name: NES Classic
consoleOne.info: The console that singlehandedly save the games industry, home to Mario Bros and Legend of Zelda!

consoleTwo.name: PlayStation 1
consoleTwo.info: Fire up with Spyro the Dragon or crash at insane speeds with Crash Bandicot!

consoleThree.name: GameCube
consoleThree.info: Tame the terrible Dark Lugia, defeat Ganondorf in Wind Waker o blast your friends in Smash Bros!

consoleFour.name: SNES Classic
consoleFour.info: If the power of the NES isn't enough for you, wait not defending the Crystals in Final Fanatasy IV?

consoleFive.name: GameBoy
consoleFive.info: Do you want to be the very best? Like no one ever was? Challenge your friends from the palm of your hand!

consoleSix.name: Arcades
consoleSix.info: Why sitting at a table if you can fight invaders from Space or eat silly ghosts on these beauties?
